definition: A container typically found in public spaces or households, used for the disposal of waste materials. It is commonly used to collect and store various types of garbage or rubbish until it can be properly disposed of.

examples.german: Der Mülleimer steht neben der Tür.
examples.english: The trash can is next to the door.

examples.german: Bitte werfen Sie Ihren Müll in den Mülleimer.
examples.english: Please throw your trash in the trash can.

examples.german: Der Mülleimer ist voll und muss geleert werden.
examples.english: The trash can is full and needs to be emptied.

examples.german: Ich habe den Mülleimer im Badezimmer geleert.
examples.english: I emptied the trash can in the bathroom.
